mapper.select: select count(DISTINCT a.point_id) as NoPointNumber from t_patrol_records a join t_patrol_plan b on a.plan_id =b.id where DATE(a.create_time)=#{nowDate} and a.`status`=0
select count(DISTINCT a.point_id) as OverPointNumber from t_patrol_records a join t_patrol_plan b on a.plan_id =b.id where DATE(a.create_time)=#{nowDate} and a.`status`=1
select count(DISTINCT a.point_id) as pointNumber from t_patrol_records a join t_patrol_plan b on a.plan_id =b.id where DATE(a.create_time)=#{nowDate}

select DISTINCT a.id, c.community_name, d.building_name, d.units, a.`status`, f.start_time, f.end_time, g.REAL_NAME from t_patrol_records a join t_patrol_points b on a.point_id = b.id join t_community c on b.community_id = c.id join t_building d on b.community_id = d.community_id and b.building_id = d.id join t_patrol_path e on e.id = a.path_id join t_patrol_plan f on a.plan_id = f.id join sys_admin_info g on g.ADMIN_ID = f.inspector_id where e.type = 0 and a.id = #{id}

select c.`name` as itemName, d.community_name, a.`status`, e.start_time, e.end_time, f.REAL_NAME, a.id from t_patrol_records a join t_patrol_path b on a.path_id = b.id join t_inspection_item c on c.id = a.point_id join t_community d on d.id = c.community_id join t_patrol_plan e on e.id = a.plan_id join sys_admin_info f on f.ADMIN_ID = e.inspector_id where b.type =1 and a.id=#{id}

select distinct a.id,b.path_id,c.type from t_patrol_records a join t_patrol_plan b on a.plan_id = b.id join t_patrol_path c on c.id = b.path_id where DATE (a.create_time) = #{nowDate} and b.inspector_id = #{inspectorId}
